title: Lenikis Women's UPF+50 Sun Visor Detachable Flap Hat Foldable Wide Brimmed UV Protection Hat
feature: Full Protection: features 50+ UPF fabric which block 98% of UV rays. This flap hats with wide brim (5.7 inch / 14.5cm) will keep your face, ears, neck and the back of your head shaded at all times.
Detachable Flaps: the flaps provide additional protection for for your face, ears and neck, which can be removed when not in use for portability.
Polyester: lightweight, quick-drying, water and stain resistant. The moisture wicking sweatband keeps sweat out of your eyes and makes your head breathable in sunny with strong sunshine.
One Fits All: velcro back band is adjustable from 20” to 23”(51-58cm) and chin strap provide a comfortable fit and keep your hat from being blown away on windy days.
FUNctional: whether you are out walking, hiking, fishing, playing golf, gardening, sightseeing, on the beach, at a ball game or working outdoors, this hat has you covered.
description: The sun supports life on our planet, but its life-giving rays also pose dangers. The sun's primary danger is in the form of We all know the importance of protecting ourselves from harmful UV rays. But let’s face it: Moreover, applying sunscreen to your neck means trying to work around your natural hairline and risk either missing a spot or getting your hair covered in grease. You may not see this hat on a fashion show. But you must have seen this on adventurers everywhere who are having a good time without losing their cool. This hat is engineered for ctional sun protection. Wear this UV protection hat attachment the next time you go hiking, fishing, golfing, baseball… any outdoor activity. Rest assured that your face, ears, neck and the back of your head are protected from the scorching summer sun and cancer-causing UV rays. Material: Polyester Style: Fishing hat/Sun hat/Safari hat Feature: Detachable/Breathable/Light/Durable/soft Size: Adjustable 51-58cm Color: Blue/Pink/Grey/Purple Season: Spring/Summer/Autumn Package Content: 1 hat
